job_tasks.phrase: align technical solutions with strategic goals
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need to connect technical work with business objectives.

job_tasks.phrase: translate business needs into technical requirements
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly states the translation of business needs into technical specifications.

job_tasks.phrase: Generating and preserving stakeholder alignment across multiple areas of business towards the strategy defined in (1).
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the importance of aligning technical strategy with various business stakeholders.

job_tasks.phrase: Identifying new areas of investment, evaluating their feasibility, and getting stakeholder buy-in
job_tasks.justification: Involves understanding business opportunities, assessing their viability, and securing support.

job_tasks.phrase: Educating stakeholders around the ML engineering aspect of our products
job_tasks.justification: Requires explaining technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders to foster understanding and buy-in.

job_tasks.phrase: Customer focused and obsessed with solving user problems
job_tasks.justification: Indicates a deep understanding of customer needs and a focus on addressing them through the product.

job_tasks.phrase: making data-driven decisions
job_tasks.justification: Emphasizes the use of data to inform strategic and operational choices, a core business understanding aspect.

job_tasks.phrase: Very strong communication and stakeholder leadership skills and ability to lead priorities in time critical situations.
job_tasks.justification: This speaks to influencing and guiding business priorities, a key aspect of business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience with distributed systems, such as Hadoop
job_tasks.justification: Hadoop is a foundational technology for distributed data processing, indicating data engineering responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience working with data engineering and Big Data in general
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions experience with data engineering and Big Data concepts.

job_tasks.phrase: Advantage - Previous experience with data analysis and generating data insights
job_tasks.justification: While data analysis is related, generating insights often involves preparing and manipulating data, aligning with data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Defining the ML/AI architecture for Booking around the aforementioned domains
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on the high-level design and structure of ML/AI systems, which includes model considerations.

job_tasks.phrase: platforms and capabilities in Generative AI, Search Ranking and Recommendations, Promotion Optimization and Content Intelligence (Natural Language Processing & Computer Vision)
job_tasks.justification: These are all domains where sophisticated modeling techniques are applied, including generative AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Working with Machine Learning and Personalisation Paradigms
job_tasks.justification: Directly refers to the application and understanding of machine learning paradigms.

job_tasks.phrase: Principal ML Engineer
job_tasks.justification: The title itself implies a significant software engineering component, especially in an ML context.

job_tasks.phrase: 8+ years hands-on ML engineering development experience
job_tasks.justification: Highlights extensive practical experience in ML engineering development, a core software engineering activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Experience as a technical lead in an organization
job_tasks.justification: Technical leadership often involves guiding software development efforts.

job_tasks.phrase: building the right architecture and capabilities for the business
job_tasks.justification: This phrase refers to the creation of functional systems and their underlying architecture.

job_tasks.phrase: building a strong knowledge-base of the system
job_tasks.justification: Implies a deep understanding and documentation of the existing software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: technical understanding and systems thinking
job_tasks.justification: Essential for designing, developing, and integrating complex software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Agile development methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Agile is a software development framework, indicating involvement in the development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with our sister ML-Ops department, to build the right architecture and capabilities for the business
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions collaboration with an MLOps department, indicating an understanding and involvement in operational aspects of ML systems.

job_tasks.phrase: 5+ years of ML engineering experience on high traffic systems
job_tasks.justification: Experience with high-traffic systems often necessitates robust deployment and operational strategies (MLOps).

soft_skills.phrase: Providing feedback to people managers and teams
Mentoring and coaching Managers and Individual Contributors
Very strong communication and stakeholder leadership skills
Defining the strategic technical direction over 1-3 years
Analyze, understand and share takeaways to build a strong knowledge-base of the system
Defining the ML/AI architecture for Booking
Strong technical understanding and systems thinking
Strong strategic problem solver with the ability to zoom in as well as see a 10,000 ft view.
Customer focused and obsessed with solving user problems
ability to lead priorities in time critical situations
driving some of this brand-new innovation

classification.rationale: This role strongly emphasizes defining ML/AI architecture, driving innovation in areas like Generative AI, Search Ranking, and Recommendations, and requires extensive hands-on ML engineering development. While Generative AI is mentioned, the core focus is on the broader ML engineering lifecycle, including strategy, architecture, and operational considerations, rather than solely on building applications with LLMs.
